TopicTitle: The unofficially official 0.24-Kerbapalooza Thread - Now extra #HYPETRAIN!

Articles.Content:
OH MY GOD, OH MY GOD, OH MY GOD!

https://twitter.com/KerbalSpaceP/status/489837516972122112
This is crazier than the DayZ hypetrain!
I'm going to fly a model rocket. Maybe that will help.

OH MY GOD, OH MY GOD, OH MY GOD!

https://twitter.com/KerbalSpaceP/status/489837516972122112

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BsxAoCmCcAApkbo.png

Again, very cryptic!

It's very much accepted if you guys truly want to do it, we're all just floating in bugslaying and the surreality of it all.

Don't pay to much attention to the hype train, we would all rather you guys keep working on the final touches of .24!
Looks like the hype train is just about to step up to "ludicrous speed" hold tight everyone!!!

I'm going to fly a model rocket. Maybe that will help.

That's a great idea. I haven't done that in years. I think it might be time to do it again. Shooting off model rockets was always a blast.

It's very much accepted if you guys truly want to do it, we're all just floating in bugslaying and the surreality of it all.

Personally, I think it'd be cooler if the pizza funds were rounded up and instead donated to a trustworthy charity, so maybe pizzas could be given to the less fortunate.

It's very much accepted if you guys truly want to do it, we're all just floating in bugslaying and the surreality of it all.

We are very much willing to do it for you guys. We've hit a few snags though - we tried dominos initially, but they didn't take card payments for online orders.

Edit:

That is a wonderful idea, Rowsdower.

Edited July 17, 2014 by adge
change in plans?

Your usually told to return to your seats right before the train comes into the station.

What kind of crazy country do you live in where they tell you that on the train? o_0

In the Netherlands, you're better off waiting by the doors so you can run like a madman to catch your connection, because your train is invariably two minutes late (although "still on time" because of allowable "margins"... NS basterds...).

Personally, I think it'd be cooler if the pizza funds were rounded up and instead donated to a trustworthy charity, so maybe pizzas could be given to the less fortunate.

I don't think I could agree any harder with this.
Whatever we do, I'll gladly Paypal a couple dollars for it. Thank you guys @ Squad.

Strap on!

Staff is here, means the station is near!

This is crazier than the DayZ hypetrain!

Thats because this one got HYPEBoosters!!!

What kind of crazy country do you live in where they tell you that on the train? o_0

In the Netherlands, you're better off waiting by the doors so you can run like a madman to catch your connection, because your train is invariably two minutes late (although "still on time" because of allowable "margins"... NS basterds...).

I don't know where Alshain lives, but I can tell you that America doesn't really do trains, and when we do, I'm pretty sure we get it wrong.
This is one of the strangest conversations I've had on a hype train.

I don't think I could agree any harder with this.
